Articles.Content:
I started creating a game. I have minimal scripting experience but I still managed to do something.

Lunar Shuttle Beta

Link: http://scratch.mit.edu/projects/13225473/

The controls are on the right.

Feedback really, really, really appreciated!
Pretty good, maybe you can make a fuel system?

Pretty good with minimal experience

A couple of things:

- Remap the movement controls to ASWD, or give the option to switch between that and arrow keys. Using the mouse, arrow keys and spacebar together isn't the easiest thing to do, and with X and C it's almost impossible to use all controls at once.

- Remove whatever is preventing the bullets from passing through the front of the shuttle so it's possible to shoot forwards.
